system.requirements: Tier 2; Int 35, Tech-Use, Trade (Armourer) Aptitudes; Intelligence, Tech, Unaligned
system.effect:
Character increases AP of any armour they wear by 1 in all locations that armour covers. Requires one hour per day to clean, repair, and make minor modifications to armour (no test needed). Bonus only applies to armour when worn by character.
DH 2E: Gain Intelligence Bonus points that can be distributed between Armour pieces (Head, Body, Left/Right Arm, Left/Right Leg), each point increases AP by 1 at that location.
